title: Microsoft is quietly walking back its diversity efforts
description: Microsoft has been publishing data about the gender, race, and ethnic breakdown of its employees for more than a decade. Since 2019 it's been publishing a full diversity and inclusion report annually, and at the same time made reporting on diversity a require…
content: Microsoft is toeing the line in Trumps America. Microsoft is toeing the line in Trumps America. by Tom WarrenClose Tom Warren Posts from this author will be… [+13276 chars]
